room_title: Escape room "Red Planet" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: My work team did an escape for our holiday party. Everyone had a great time. The rooms were very challenging and very fun to figure out. Our room helpers knew just when to help with a clue.

room_title: Escape room "Red Planet" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This place was INCREDIBLE. The staff was friendly and helpful, the game was so much fun! Our game master, Emma was so great and gave the perfect hints to help us without giving anything away. This was an excellent date to share with my partner and I have no doubt that I will return to share it with my friends!

room_title: Escape room "Red Planet" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Hubby and I have gone to this escape room twice - both rooms we went to were super fun and engaging for everyone. We are now hooked!
